items.title: US military officials in Ukraine for talks on ending war
items.description: It comes amid reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly containing major concessions for Ukraine.

items.title: Reform politician suspended from Welsh Parliament over racial slur
items.description: Laura Anne Jones apologised for her behaviour after offensive comments were made over WhatsApp.

items.title: The big questions now Scotland are going to the World Cup
items.description: Where are we going? What's the score with visas & ESTAs? Who will sing our World Cup song?

items.title: Russian spy ship pointed lasers at RAF pilots tracking it, says defence secretary
items.description: John Healey says he has updated the Navy's rules for tracking the vessel after the "dangerous" move.

items.title: Dozens go on trial over North Macedonia nightclub fire that killed 63
items.description: Thirty-five people and three institutions are on trial. Prosecutors say years of failings turned the venue into a death trap.
